'''Lucklight Fly''' is a type of creature that can be found in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines|The Chasm]], [[Liyue]]. 

==Drops==
{{Card|Luminescent Spine|1}}

It will also restore 1 energy to the [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]].

==Locations==
Lucklight Flies are found exclusively in The Chasm.

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/9?shown_types=350 Official Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
